exceptions.exn: The LHS of scal_distr_r (scal (plus _ _) _) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros. intros Hmult Hseries. unfold is_pseries in *. unfold PS_scal. unfold is_series in *. intros n. rewrite scal_distr_r. rewrite Hmult. rewrite scal_distr_l. rewrite Hmult. apply Hseries.
